Home About Us Services Careers Contact Us Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers
About 3N Consulting

Results. Delivered.

Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes. We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.

Our Mission

3N Consulting is dedicated to delivering measurable results through execution-focused consulting. We build long-term partnerships with our clients, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality to ensure savings flow directly to our clients.

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do

Integrity

We maintain the highest standards of integrity in all our dealings, ensuring transparency and honesty in every engagement.

Client-Centric

Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. We invest in understanding their challenges and delivering tailored solutions.

Results-Oriented

We are committed to delivering tangible, measurable results that drive real business impact.

Ownership

We don't just staff projects—we own the results and keep our commitments, every time.

Who We Are

3N Consulting is a Maryland-based certified Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) in the Small Business Reserve (SBR) program and an NMSDC certified MBE. With extensive experience serving public agencies, educational institutions, and private sector organizations, we bring deep expertise in organizational redesign, strategy & operations, data analytics, digital transformation, and human capital management.

Our Approach

We combine strategic thinking with operational excellence to deliver sustainable change. Our team consists of experienced consultants who understand the complexities of modern business and are committed to helping organizations navigate challenges and seize opportunities.

Ready to Work with Us?

Let's discuss how 3N Consulting can help your organization achieve measurable results.

in about.html, After the “Our Values” section, I want to put a section called “Our Story” with the same spacing between paragraphs as in the "Who We Are" section. Here is the text for “Our Story”:

3N Consulting was founded in 2023, when CEO Nick Gupta returned to Maryland after two decades of working across major cities and serving clients around the world. Motivated by a desire to strengthen local organizations and tap into the region’s deep pool of talent, he set out to build a consulting firm rooted in community impact, excellence, and integrity.

By 2024, 3N Consulting’s core team had taken shape. Since then, we have grown quarter after quarter, propelled by a clear and consistent philosophy: deliver high-quality, high-impact consulting services at rates that make world-class support accessible. This commitment enables us to compete—and win—against leading global consulting firms by combining exceptional work quality with what clients often describe as “shockingly” reasonable prices.

We have successfully delivered on every engagement to date. Clients regularly extend our partnerships into subsequent phases of work, and many of our new projects come directly from referrals. Their trust and continued support serve as the engine of our growth and a testament to the value we strive to create for every organization we work with.

3N Consulting
Results. Delivered.
Home About Us Services Careers Contact Us Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers
About 3N Consulting

Results. Delivered.

Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes. We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.

Who We Are

3N Consulting is a Maryland-based certified Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) in the Small Business Reserve (SBR) program and an NMSDC certified MBE. With extensive experience serving public agencies, educational institutions, and private sector organizations, we bring deep expertise in organizational redesign, strategy & operations, data analytics, digital transformation, and human capital management.

3N Consulting is dedicated to delivering measurable results through execution-focused consulting. We build long-term partnerships with our clients, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality to ensure savings flow directly to our clients. We combine strategic thinking with operational excellence to deliver sustainable change. Our team consists of experienced consultants who understand the complexities of modern business and are committed to helping organizations navigate challenges and seize opportunities.

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do

Integrity

We maintain the highest standards of integrity in all our dealings, ensuring transparency and honesty in every engagement.

Client-Centric

Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. We invest in understanding their challenges and delivering tailored solutions.

Results-Oriented

We are committed to delivering tangible, measurable results that drive real business impact.

Ownership

We don't just staff projects—we own the results and keep our commitments, every time.

Our Story

3N Consulting was founded in 2023, when CEO Nick Gupta returned to Maryland after two decades of working across major cities and serving clients around the world. Motivated by a desire to strengthen local organizations and tap into the region's deep pool of talent, he set out to build a consulting firm rooted in community impact, excellence, and integrity.

By 2024, 3N Consulting's core team had taken shape. Since then, we have grown quarter after quarter, propelled by a clear and consistent philosophy: deliver high-quality, high-impact consulting services at rates that make world-class support accessible. This commitment enables us to compete—and win—against leading global consulting firms by combining exceptional work quality with what clients often describe as "shockingly" reasonable prices.

We have successfully delivered on every engagement to date. Clients regularly extend our partnerships into subsequent phases of work, and many of our new projects come directly from referrals. Their trust and continued support serve as the engine of our growth and a testament to the value we strive to create for every organization we work with.

Our Approach

We combine strategic thinking with operational excellence to deliver sustainable change. Our team consists of experienced consultants who understand the complexities of modern business and are committed to helping organizations navigate challenges and seize opportunities.

Ready to Work with Us?

Let's discuss how 3N Consulting can help your organization achieve measurable results.

Get in Touch →
3N Consulting

Results. Delivered.

© 2026 3N Consulting. All Rights Reserved.

Home About Us Services Careers Contact Us Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers
Productized Solution

CIO Services

Maximizing Value from Technology Investments

Take Control of Your Technology Landscape

3N Consulting's CIO Services Solution helps organizations take control of their technology landscape—optimizing IT spend, rationalizing application portfolios, and improving the performance of development and maintenance operations.

Our goal is simple: ensure that every technology dollar supports the mission, not just the infrastructure. By combining strategic assessment, financial analytics, and deep IT modernization expertise, 3N empowers technology leaders to make confident, data-driven decisions about where to invest, consolidate, or innovate.

The Challenge

IT Complexity and Cost

Today's IT environment is more complex and costly than ever. Many organizations face:

  • Escalating IT spend without clear linkage to business value
  • Redundant or underused applications driving unnecessary maintenance costs
  • Inefficient development and support models consuming valuable resources
  • Siloed technology decisions that hinder agility and innovation

3N's CIO Services provide a structured, evidence-based approach to uncover inefficiencies, eliminate redundancies, and modernize operations—turning IT from a cost center into a strategic enabler.

Our Approach

Comprehensive, Data-Driven Assessment

Our CIO Services Solution begins with a comprehensive, data-driven assessment that connects financial, operational, and technical insights into one unified view of IT performance. We focus on four key dimensions:

IT Spend Assessment

Analyze total cost of ownership (TCO) across infrastructure, applications, and services to identify immediate cost reduction opportunities.

Application Portfolio Analysis

Evaluate the performance, utilization, and value contribution of each system across the enterprise.

Application Rationalization

Streamline redundant or outdated systems and prioritize modernization initiatives that yield the highest ROI.

Development & Maintenance Optimization

Assess development productivity, vendor performance, and resource allocation to improve delivery speed and quality.

The result is a clear, actionable roadmap that aligns IT investments with strategic priorities while improving efficiency and accountability.

Our Capabilities

Powered by Analytics and Modernization Expertise

3N leverages proven frameworks, including Technology Value Mapping, Application Health Scoring, and Total Cost Diagnostics, to provide a fact-based foundation for every recommendation. Our consultants combine experience in enterprise IT governance, financial modeling, and digital transformation to ensure that CIOs have the insights needed to make high-impact decisions quickly.

Our team has supported clients across public sector agencies, higher education, and Fortune 500 enterprises, helping them right-size their technology portfolios, strengthen vendor management, and unlock millions in operational savings.

Proven Impact

Results That Matter

Organizations using 3N's CIO Services Solution achieve measurable results, including:

10–30% Reduction in IT Spend

Through rationalization and sourcing optimization.

Streamlined Application Portfolios

Reducing complexity and maintenance overhead.

Improved Time-to-Market

For new digital products and enhancements.

Greater Strategic Alignment

Between IT operations and business strategy.

Enhanced Governance & Transparency

Enhanced governance, transparency, and performance measurement.

Each engagement delivers tangible value—helping CIOs build credibility with business leadership and deliver technology that performs with purpose.

Why 3N Consulting

Clarity, Control, and Measurable Impact

3N's CIO Services are designed for leaders who demand clarity, control, and measurable impact from their technology investments. We go beyond benchmarking—we build a foundation for modernization that is both strategic and executable.

Our approach bridges the gap between business and IT, combining consulting rigor with technical depth to deliver sustained results.

At 3N Consulting, CIO Services means smarter spend, simpler portfolios, and stronger performance.

Discuss your CIO strategy →
Results. Delivered. Execution-focused consulting measured on outcomes.
We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.
Phone: (301) 723-7057
Address: 6710A Rockledge Drive, Bethesda, MD 20817
LinkedIn Contact Disclaimers

3N Consulting
Results. Delivered.
Home About Us Services Careers Contact Us Meet Our Team Our Toolkit Disclaimers
Productized Solution

Manufacturing Planning Solution

Aligning Production, Demand, and Profitability

Transform Production Planning Into Performance

3N Consulting's Manufacturing Planning Solution helps manufacturers achieve the perfect balance between production efficiency, demand fulfillment, and inventory optimization. We bring together data analytics, operational strategy, and digital tools to transform production planning from a reactive scheduling function into a proactive, performance-driven capability.

Our solution is built for manufacturers seeking to improve schedule reliability, reduce waste, and increase throughput—all while maintaining cost efficiency and customer satisfaction.

The Challenge

Complexity in Modern Manufacturing

Manufacturers today face growing complexity: unpredictable demand, global supply constraints, labor shortages, and rising input costs. Without integrated visibility across production, inventory, and demand planning, even strong operations struggle with:

  • Overproduction or stockouts due to inaccurate forecasts
  • Idle capacity and scheduling conflicts
  • Excess working capital tied up in inventory
  • Missed delivery commitments and customer dissatisfaction

3N's Manufacturing Planning Solution addresses these challenges head-on, ensuring that production plans are aligned, adaptive, and analytics-driven.

Our Approach

Structured, End-to-End Methodology

We apply a structured, end-to-end methodology that connects forecasting, scheduling, and inventory management into one cohesive system of performance. Our process includes:

Current-State Assessment

Evaluate production planning, scheduling, and supply chain workflows across plants or business units.

Demand & Capacity Analysis

Identify gaps between customer demand, production capacity, and resource allocation.

Scheduling Optimization

Develop data-driven production schedules that balance throughput, equipment utilization, and lead times.

Inventory Optimization

Analyze inventory turnover, safety stock levels, and material flow to minimize working capital without risking availability.

Digital Enablement

Introduce planning dashboards, forecasting models, and AI-driven simulations to anticipate bottlenecks and improve decision-making.

Execution Roadmap

Deliver a clear, actionable plan with quantifiable targets for cost savings, on-time delivery, and efficiency improvements.

Every recommendation is grounded in data, discipline, and practicality—ensuring measurable gains across productivity, cost, and performance.

Our Capabilities

Powered by Analytics and Industry Insight

3N Consulting integrates advanced analytics and operational modeling into every planning engagement. By combining real-time production data with predictive forecasting and "what-if" simulation, our solution helps manufacturers respond faster to shifts in demand, supply disruptions, or resource constraints.

Our consultants bring deep experience in industrial products, automotive, electronics, and consumer goods manufacturing, enabling us to adapt proven methods—such as Lean, Six Sigma, and constraint-based scheduling—to each client's unique environment.

Proven Impact

Results That Matter

Organizations using 3N's Manufacturing Planning Solution achieve measurable operational and financial improvements, including:

10–25% Inventory Cost Reduction

Through optimized holding levels and improved turnover.

Improved On-Time Delivery

Performance improvement of 15–30% through better planning and scheduling.

Increased Production Throughput

Higher utilization rates and reduced cycle times.

Faster Response Capability

Shorter planning cycles and faster response to demand changes.

Enhanced Visibility

Enhanced visibility across supply, production, and logistics functions.

The result: a production system that runs smarter, leaner, and more predictably—with improved ability to meet customer demand while protecting margins.

Why 3N Consulting

Strategy, Analytics, and Operational Excellence

3N's Manufacturing Planning Solution brings together strategy, analytics, and operational excellence. We help manufacturers move from siloed scheduling and reactive planning to a fully integrated, data-driven model that empowers decision-makers across production, supply chain, and sales.

Our approach is pragmatic and execution-focused—delivering quick wins while laying the foundation for long-term digital transformation in manufacturing operations.

At 3N Consulting, we don't just plan production—we engineer performance.

Discuss your manufacturing planning →

We build long-term partnerships, take ownership of outcomes, and practice frugality so savings flow to clients.
